com.qtplaf.library.swing.core

Class JTableRecord.HeaderMouseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.swing.event.MouseHandler
      • com.qtplaf.library.swing.core.JTableRecord.HeaderMouseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    JTableRecord

    class JTableRecord.HeaderMouseHandler
extends MouseHandler
    The mouse handler to handle mouse events on the header.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int resizeMargin
      Margin to accept the point to be in the resize area of the column header.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private int getColumnToResize(java.awt.Point p)
      Returns the number of the column to resize given the point of the mouse, by checking if the point is in the limit of two subsequent columns.
      private boolean isResize(java.awt.Point p)
      Returns a boolean indicating if the point is in the resize area.
      private boolean isResize(java.awt.Point p, int column)
      Returns a boolean indicating if the point is in the resize area in the right of the column.

      • getColumnToResize

        private int getColumnToResize(java.awt.Point p)
        Returns the number of the column to resize given the point of the mouse, by checking if the point is in the limit of two subsequent columns.
        Parameters:
        p - The mouse point.
        Returns:
        The coumn number to resize or -1 if none applicable.

        column - The column number.
